title: In this zone, all uses permissible in Residential Zone shall be permitted subject to FSI restrictions mentioned in these regulations
clause_text: In this zone, all uses permissible in Residential Zone shall be permitted subject to FSI restrictions mentioned in these regulations. (Chapter 10)
